boardgame.name: The Great Dinosaur Rush
Wielka Wystawa Dinozaurów
boardgame.description: The Great Dinosaur Rush _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or the Bone Wars, as it's otherwise called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; was a period of incredible advancement in paleontology (i.e., the discovery of fossils)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In The Great Dinosaur Rush, players compete to grab bones from the best dig sites, and build new dinosaurs for prestigious museums, gaining notoriety in the process by stealing bones, sabotaging dig sites, and otherwise impeding your fellow paleontologists._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played over turns, each with two main phases: dig and build. During the dig phase, players collect different-colored bones from dig sites and perform actions. Some dirty actions give players secret notoriety tokens. Notoriety adds to players' scores at the end of the game, but having the MOST notoriety SUBTRACTS from the score! During the build phase, players create their dinosaurs from the bones they collected, maximizing them to score points in various museum categories: length, size, height, ferociousness, etc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You'll have to play dirty if you want to win _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; just not too dirty!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is from the KS, still in shrink-wrapped. Never played, the back of the box bows slightly inward but I do not perceive any cosmetic defects or anything that can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be fixed by having some rigid mdf or cardboard inside the box (which will be needed if you want to compartmentalize things anyway. I originally bought it to supplement by area control/building game part of my collection, but need to start selling off parts of my collection.
Components punched out. Never been played.

Punched but never played. Complete and in excellent condition.
